title: HellerudÂ­svingen
overview: In the first episode, the group of friends Erlend, Steinar and Hassan become billionaires overnight when they sell an app to Elon Musk. In a way, the Sami get their hands on the money and decide to take over Norway. The boys are unhappy under the Sami regime and leave Hellerudsvingen for Kautokeino with a cunning plan to get their money back...
